description: Event detection in Python based on EigenEvent
README.md:
eventmon: scalable event detection in Python
============================================

EventMon is intended to be an off-the-shelf solution for
spatio-temporal event detection in Python.
It should be usable out of the box with real-time data,
and be scalable to many sources and features with down to a second resolution.
with some tunable parameters but working robustly on a range
of data with the default configuration.
The algorithm is based on EigenEvent (Fanaee-T, 2014).

Some of the goals of the project are:

* Real-time monitoring suited to EC2, etc. with data pushed from many servers
  or other data sources
* Interpretation of significant events and configurable alarm
* OpenCL and/or distributed implementations as an option for large-scale input

References
----------

* Fanaee-T, Hadi, and Joao Gama. "EigenEvent: An Algorithm for Event Detection from Complex Data Streams in Syndromic Surveillance." *arXiv preprint arXiv:1406.3496* (2014).
